title: The Commissioner may insist on installation of solar energy collectors on the terraces of the buildings for harnessing solar energy for purposes other than water heating as well
clause_text: The Commissioner may insist on installation of solar energy collectors on the terraces of the buildings for harnessing solar energy for purposes other than water heating as well. The construction of SWH system shall be in conformity with
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Commissioner may insist on installation of solar energy collectors on the terraces of the buildings for harnessing solar energy for purposes other than water heating as well.
